data.title: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency
data.meta_description: Website of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA). EPA's mission is to protect human health and the environment.
data.text:
EPA Awards $27 Billion in Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund Grants

Grant recipients can begin accessing funds to mobilize financing for thousands of climate and clean energy projects.

Read the News Release

Reduce Your Exposure to Wildfire Smoke

Reducing exposure to wildfire smoke is important for everyone's health—especially children, older adults, and people with heart or lung diseases.

Wildfires and Indoor Air Quality (IAQ)

Community Change Grants Selections Announced

EPA has announced the selection of an initial $325 million in Community Change Grants to help disadvantaged communities tackle environmental and climate justice challenges.

Learn more about Community Change Grants

CPRG Selected Applications Announced

EPA announces selected applications for $4.3 billion dollar Climate Pollution Reduction Grants general competition to fund measures tackling climate change, improving air quality, and advancing environmental justice.

View selected recipients

Careers at EPA

From tackling the climate crisis to advancing environmental justice, what happens here changes the world. At EPA, you can be a changemaker.

Investing in America

EPA has an opportunity to move further and faster than ever before to build a healthier and brighter future for people and the planet.

Applying for EPA Grants

Discover EPA-hosted webinars to learn how to apply for, or manage an EPA grant.

Find Investments in Your Community

Discover the historic investments made in the health, equity, and resilience of American communities through Bipartisan Infrastructure Law funding and the Inflation Reduction Act.

Climate Change

Understanding and addressing climate change is critical to EPA's mission of protecting human health and the environment. Find resources and accurate information about climate change.

Drinking Water Resources

Learn how water gets to your drinking water tap every day, the different types of public water systems, and other basic information about drinking water safety.

EPA Perspectives

Read commentary-style articles from EPA staff.

Why Stories Matter

Years spent observing various cultures threaded through multiple languages gave me my biggest gift; I can absorb a person’s voice into my pen and onto their paper.

EPA's Research Efforts to Protect Public and Environmental Health from Wildland Fire Smoke

Stay informed, stay prepared, and we can mitigate the effects and challenges of wildland fire smoke together.

Read all EPA Perspectives

EPA News Releases

Read the latest news from EPA.

Search all news releases
